dqm.jku.trustkg.blockchain.blocks

Class DSDBlock

  • java.lang.Object
    • dqm.jku.trustkg.blockchain.Block
      • dqm.jku.trustkg.blockchain.blocks.DSDBlock
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Block>

    public class DSDBlock
extends Block
    This class defines a block data structure for a blockchain containing an DSD element.
    Author:
    optimusseptim

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String acquireHashValue()
      Calculate new hash based on blocks contents, overriden by extending block classes to create a taylormade hash for the contained data.
      DSDElement getData()
      Gets the data stored in the block
      void setData(DSDElement data)
      Sets the data stored in the block (security threat but needed for rdfbeans)
